text:
5/. Alok Sharma just told BBC that the govt has met it’s 5 tests & that “we had almost 240,000 people tested on Monday”

Yesterday, @MattHancock said he didn’t have the data on how many people had been tested.

The UK doesn’t have a digital test, trace, isolate system in place. https://t.co/G1M7hpkjjc
